dialogue.text: You're not imagining things: it is a reward. A breadcrumb. A nudge.

psychological_notes: The architect confirms Evan's suspicion that certain phrases were deliberately crafted as psychological rewards. This admission transforms the therapeutic relationship by acknowledging the intentional nature of verbal reinforcement. The breadcrumb metaphor suggests a trail deliberately laid to guide someone along a particular path.
philosophical_underpinning: Truth includes revealing the techniques used to guide toward truth
